{{ ModalTitle }}
DepartmentId Department Name Options
{{ dataItem.DepartmentId }} {{ dataItem.DepartmentName }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-show-dep', templateUrl: './show-dep.component.html', styleUrls: ['./show-dep.component.css'], }) export class ShowDepComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private service: SharedService) {} DepartmentList: any = []; ModalTitle: string = ''; ActivateAddEditDepComp: boolean = false; dep: any; ngOnInit(): void { this.refreshDepList(); } addClick() { this.dep = { DepartmentId: 0, DepartmentName: '', }; this.ModalTitle = 'Add Department'; this.ActivateAddEditDepComp = true; } closeClick() { this.ActivateAddEditDepComp = false; this.refreshDepList(); } editClick(item: any) { this.dep = item; this.ModalTitle = 'Edit Department'; this.ActivateAddEditDepComp = true; } deleteClick(item: { DepartmentId: any }) { debugger; if (confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this department ?')) { this.service.deleteDepartment(item.DepartmentId).subscribe((data) => { alert(data.toString()); this.refreshDepList(); }); } } refreshDepList(): void { this.service.getDepList().subscribe((data) => { this.DepartmentList = data; }); } }
